SEARCH
Package main.java.com.keysmash.database

Class DatabaseManager

java.lang.Object
main.java.com.keysmash.database.DatabaseManager
public class DatabaseManager extends Object
DatabaseManager class handles the database connection and operations for the Keysmash application. It is responsible for initializing the database, creating tables, and executing various CRUD operations related to profiles, texts, scores, and leaderboards.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    DatabaseManager()
    Constructs a DatabaseManager instance and initializes the database connection.

  • Constructor Details

    • DatabaseManager

      public DatabaseManager()
      Constructs a DatabaseManager instance and initializes the database connection. Lists available JDBC drivers and creates necessary tables if the connection is successful.

  • Method Details

    • close

      public void close()
      Closes the database connection if it is currently open.

    • createProfile

      public void createProfile(String username)
      Creates a new profile in the profiles table with the specified username.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the new profile

    • addText

      public void addText(String content)
      Adds a new text entry to the texts table.
      Parameters:
      content - the content of the text to be added

    • addScore

      public void addScore(int profileId, int textId, double speed, double errorPercentage)
      Adds a new score entry to the scores table for a specific profile and text.
      Parameters:
      profileId - the ID of the profile
      textId - the ID of the text
      speed - the typing speed of the profile
      errorPercentage - the error percentage of the profile's typing

    • addToLeaderboard

      public void addToLeaderboard(int textId, int profileId, double speed, double errorPercentage)
      Adds a score entry to the leaderboard for a specific profile and text.
      Parameters:
      textId - the ID of the text
      profileId - the ID of the profile
      speed - the typing speed of the profile
      errorPercentage - the error percentage of the profile's typing

    • getLeaderboardData

      public List<String[]> getLeaderboardData()
      Retrieves the leaderboard data, including usernames and their best speed and error percentages. The top 10 entries are returned, sorted by speed and error percentage.
      Returns:
      a list of string arrays containing leaderboard data

    • populateDummyData

      public void populateDummyData()
      Populates the database with dummy data for testing purposes, including profiles and texts.

    • isProfileExists

      public boolean isProfileExists(String username)
      Checks if a profile with the given username exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      username - the username to check for existence
      Returns:
      true if the profile exists, false otherwise

    • storeScore

      public void storeScore(String username, int wpm, int accuracy)
      Stores a score for a given username in the database.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the profile
      wpm - the words per minute score
      accuracy - the accuracy percentage

    • getLatestScore

      public int[] getLatestScore(String username)
      Retrieves the latest score for a given username.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the profile
      Returns:
      an array containing the latest speed and error percentage
